oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Andrew Jackson portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Full-length portrait of General Andrew Jackson in military uniform, standing next to cannon, holding pen and paper. One glove on the ground.
Portrait was painted approximately 1828 and is housed at the Corcoran Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845
Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845;New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812
Generals;Uniforms
